entry.title: js 编写简单的番茄钟
entry.content: 效果展示 html部分123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="zh-cn"><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>pomodoro</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css"></head><body> <div class="container" id="container"> <h1>Pomodoro</h1> <div class="header"> <div class="header-left"> <p>休息时间</p> <button class="button" id="blreduce">-</button> <span id="blnum">5</span> <button class="button" id="bladd">+</button> </div> <div class="header-right"> <p>学习时间</p> <button class="button" id="slreduce">-</button> <span id="slnum">25</span> <button class="button" id="sladd">+</button> </div> </div> <div class="clock" id="clock"> <p id="timename">开始学习吧</p> <p id="timer">25</p> <span id="fill"></span> </div> <div id="start"> <p id="click">开始</p> </div> </div> <script src="js/app.js"></script></body></html> css部分12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273747576777879808182838485@charset ="utf-8";* { margin: 0; padding: 0;}.container { position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; margin: auto; height: 736px; width: 414px; text-align: center; background-color: #333; color: #fff;}h1 { padding: 40px 0 20px 0; font-size: 50px;}.header > div { display: inline-block; font-size: 20px;}.header-left { margin-right: 80px;}.header-left >button,.header-right >button { width: 20px; font-size: 25px; border: none; background: inherit; cursor: pointer; color: #fff;}.clock { position: relative; height: 350px; width: 350px; margin: 20px auto; border: 4px solid #99cc00; border-radius: 50%; overflow: hidden; z-index: 20;}.clock::before{ content: ''; border-radius: 50%; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 0; right: 0; z-index: 2;}.clock p { height: 150px; font-size: 40px; line-height: 200px;}#fill { /*height: 150px; background: #000;*/ width: 350px; position: absolute; bottom: 0; left: 0; z-index: -1;}#click,#stop { line-height: 80px; height: 80px; width: 80px; margin: 0 auto; background-color: #000; border: 2px solid #99cc00; background: #666; border-radius: 50%; cursor: pointer;}#stop { background-color: #F58265;} js部分123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596979899100101102103104105106107108109110111112113114115116117118119120121122123124125126127128129130131132133var sltime = document.getElementById("slnum");var bltime = document.getElementById("blnum");var timeName = document.getElementById("timename");var relTime = document.getElementById("timer");var click = document.getElementById("click");var fill = document.getElementById("fill");var stopTime = false;var secs = 60 * sltime.innerHTML + 1;var secss = 60 * bltime.innerHTML + 1;//判断点击状态click.onclick = function ifStop() { if (stopTime) { stopTime = false click.innerHTML = "继续"//+"<p id='stop'>"+ "停止"+"</p>" //点击停止 /* var stop = document.getElementById('stop') stop.onclick =function(){ document.location.reload(); }*/ } else { stopTime = true; click.innerHTML = "暂停" if (timeName.innerHTML == "休息一下吧") { firstToHms(); } else { secondsToHms(); } }};//改变时间函数function changeTime() { var btn = document.getElementsByClassName("button"); if (stopTime == false) { btn[0].onclick = function() { if (blnum.innerHTML > 1) { blnum.innerHTML--; if (timeName.innerHTML == "休息一下吧") { timer.innerHTML = blnum.innerHTML } secss = 60 * bltime.innerHTML + 1; } }; btn[1].onclick = function() { bltime.innerHTML++; if (timeName.innerHTML == "休息一下吧") { timer.innerHTML = blnum.innerHTML } secss = 60 * bltime.innerHTML + 1; }; btn[2].onclick = function() { if (sltime.innerHTML > 1) { sltime.innerHTML--; if (timeName.innerHTML == "专心学习哦" || timeName.innerHTML == "开始学习吧" ) { timer.innerHTML = slnum.innerHTML } secs = 60 * sltime.innerHTML + 1; } }; btn[3].onclick = function() { sltime.innerHTML++; if (timeName.innerHTML == "专心学习哦" || timeName.innerHTML == "开始学习吧" ) { timer.innerHTML = slnum.innerHTML } secs = 60 * sltime.innerHTML + 1; }; } else{ for (var i = btn.length - 1; i >= 0; i--) { btn[i].onclick = function () { } } }}setInterval(changeTime,1000);//学习倒计时function secondsToHms() { if (stopTime) { secs -= 1; var h = Math.floor(secs / 3600); var m = Math.floor(secs % 3600 / 60); var s = Math.floor(secs % 3600 % 60); var fillLength = 1 - (secs / (sltime.innerHTML * 60)); container.style.background ="#F1612C"; click.style.background = '#F58265'; fill.style.height = fillLength * 350 + "px"; fill.style.background = "#E1DB57"; timeName.innerHTML = "专心学习哦"; relTime.innerHTML = ( (h > 0 ? h + ":" + (m < 10 ? "0" : "") : "") + m + ":" + (s < 10 ? "0" : "") + s ); var setTime = setTimeout(secondsToHms, 1000); if (secs < 0) { clearInterval(setTime); secss = 60 * bltime.innerHTML + 1; firstToHms(); } }}//休息倒计时function firstToHms() { if (stopTime) { secss -= 1; var hs = Math.floor(secss / 3600); var ms = Math.floor(secss % 3600 / 60); var ss = Math.floor(secss % 3600 % 60); var fillLengths = 1 - (secss / (bltime.innerHTML * 60)); container.style.background ="#04B38C"; click.style.background = '#25CFA2'; fill.style.height = fillLengths * 350 + "px"; fill.style.background = "#E1DB57"; timeName.innerHTML = "休息一下吧"; relTime.innerHTML = ( (hs > 0 ? hs + ":" + (ms < 10 ? "0" : "") : "") + ms + ":" + (ss < 10 ? "0" : "") + ss ); var setTimes = setTimeout(firstToHms, 1000); if (secss < 0) { clearInterval(setTimes); secs = 60 * sltime.innerHTML + 1; secondsToHms(); } }} 效果地址

entry.title: JS 编写简易计算器
entry.content: 目标： Build a JavaScript Calculator Incomplete利用 javascript 设计一个简单js 简单计算器（iOS11上的计算器） 设计思路： 1.利用html+css 制作计算机页面 1234567891011121314151617181920212223242526272829303132333435363738394041424344<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="zh-cn"><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>ios 11 calculator</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="css/style.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="https://cdn.bootcss.com/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.css"></head><body> <div class="calculator"> <div class="head"> <p class="p-left"><i class="fa fa-signal"></i> 中国移动 <i class="fa fa-wifi"></i></p> <p class="p-center">18:08</p> <p class="p-right"><i class="fa fa-bluetooth-b"></i> 100% <i class="fa fa-battery-full"></i></p> </div> <input type="textbox" class="input" placeholder="0&nbsp&nbsp" disabled> <div class="buttons"> <button class="button1 button_1 button" value ="C">C</button> <button class="button2 button_1 button" value ="+/-"><sup>+</sup>/-</button> <button class="button3 button_1 button" value ="%">%</button> <button class="button4 button_2 button" value ="/">&divide</button> <button class="button5 button" value ="7">7</button> <button class="button6 button" value ="8">8</button> <button class="button7 button" value ="9">9</button> <button class="button8 button_2 button" value ="*">&times</button> <button class="button9 button" value ="4">4</button> <button class="button10 button" value="5">5</button> <button class="button11 button" value="6">6</button> <button class="button12 button_2 button" value="-">-</button> <button class="button13 button" value="1">1</button> <button class="button14 button" value="2">2</button> <button class="button15 button" value="3">3</button> <button class="button16 button_2 button" value="+">+</button> <button class="button17 button" value="0">0</button> <button class="button18 button" value=".">.</button> <button class="button19 button_2 button" value="=">=</button> </div></div><!-- jquery 引用 --><script src="https://code.jquery.com/jquery-3.1.1.min.js"></script> <!-- 外部引用js文件 --><script src="js/js.js"></script> </body></html> css 部分(css属性没有进行排序，所以看的有点乱)12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061html,body { height: 100%; width: 100%;}.calculator { height: 736px; width: 414px; margin: auto; background: #000; position: absolute; top:0;bottom: 0;left:0;right:0;}.head { font-size: 12px; margin-top: 5px; color: rgb(230,230,230); text-align: center;}.head p { margin: 0; display: inline;}.p-center { padding: 0 110px;}.input { max-width: 412px; height: 218px; border: 0 solid; background-color: #000; font-size: 60px; color: rgb(230,230,230); text-align: right; margin: 23px 0 -20px 0; }.buttons { margin-left: 8px;}.button { font: 1.6em sans-serif; color: rgb(230,230,230); background-color: rgb(52,52,52); height: 80px; width: 80px; margin: 8px 8px; border-radius: 50%; border: none; cursor: pointer;}.button_1 { background-color: #777;}.button_2 { background: rgb(235,148,30);}.button17 { width: 180px; border-radius: 50px; text-align: left; padding-left: 34px;} 2.利用javascript 完成计算(主要利用Dom数，触发点击事件，注意一些特殊功能键) js 部分（重点）123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839var calc ='';$(function(){$('button').on('click', function(){ var text = $(this).attr('value'); if (parseInt(text,10) ==text ){ //按下数字0-9 calc += text; $('.input').val(calc); } else if (text === 'C') { calc ='' $('input').val(calc); } else if (text ==='%') { //按下 % 将数字 转换为百分比 calc /= 100; $('.input') .val(calc); } // + - * / . 不可以连续出现 else if (text ==='+'|| text ==='-'||text==='*'||text==='/') { if (calc[calc.length - 1] !=="+" && calc[calc.length - 1]!=='-' && calc[calc.length - 1]!=='*' && calc[calc.length - 1]!=='/'&& calc[calc.length - 1]!=='.') { calc +=text; $('input').val(calc);} } else if (text==='.'&& calc.indexOf(".") == -1) { // 一个数里面小数点只能出现一次 calc +=text; $('.input') .val(calc); } else if (text ==='+/-'){ // + - 转换 calc = -calc; $('.input') .val(calc); } else if(text ==='='){ calc = eval(calc); $('.input') .val(calc); }}); }); [具体效果点击]（https://codepen.io/miaoxuefei/full/PJzEwo/）

动词（333个）单纯性动词(114个)本源词(4个)1be go come make 归属(4个)1234拥有某物 have得到某物 get给出某物 give拿到某物 take 终点位置(10个)1234567使到达某一位置 put使轻轻到达某一位置 lay place使其他位置到达说话者位置 bring使说话者位置到达其他位置 send使位置暂停改变 hold使位置保持不变 keep位置保持不变 rub用力使事物脱离原来的位置 pull对事物朝某一方向用力 push draw press 空间(18个)1234567空间开放或关闭 open close shut一事物进入某一空间 fit enter一事物离开某一空间 clean clear wipe一事物进入某一空间（气体或液体） fill pump spill spray事物离开某一地点 leave quit一事物到达某一地点 arrive reach一事物固定在某一个空间 fix set 时间(5个)123某事发生 begin start happen某事结束 finish某事停止 stop 方向(1个)1一个方向到另一个方向 turn 整体与部分(6个)123从大到小（用力） break crack split tear 从大到小 divide从多到少 cut 形状(5个)1bend flod twist each either neither every few many much 指代(6个)1this that these those another such 代词(7个)1I you he she we they it 疑问代词(2个)1which who 冠词(3个)1a an the 感叹词(8个)1bye hello no yes pardon please wow damn
